Posts.Content: hi just been diagnosed with grade 3 breast cancer waiting for a visit from nurse to discuss my treatment been told i will need cemo to shrink the lump before  surgery i haven't prepare myself for this i feel absolutly fine so why do i have to put my body through so much pain   I'm scared stiff didn't expect this don't think  I will cope any advice please I really don't know what to expect
Posts.Title: cemo advise
